TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataKey extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class DataKey Implements IEquatable(Of DataKey), IStateManager
type DataKey = class interface IStateManager interface IEquatable<DataKey>

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中某个记录的一个或多个主键字段。

span.span: Represents the primary key field or fields of a record in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示数据绑定控件中的记录的主键。The class is used to represent the primary key for a record in a data-bound control. 可以从数据源的多个域中的一个包含一条记录的主键。The primary key for a record can be composed of one of more fields from the data source. 尽管类不是一个集合，它可以存储多个键字段值。Although the class is not a collection, it can store multiple key field values. 一个填充键字段值的构造函数的调用类。The key field values are populated when one of the constructors for the class is called. 可以检索键字段值从对象中的以下方法：You can retrieve a key field value from a object in the following ways: - 使用属性来检索中的特定索引处的键字段值对象。Use the property to retrieve a key field value at a specific index in the object. - 使用属性来检索特定字段的键字段值。Use the property to retrieve a key field value of a specific field. - 使用属性检索中索引 0 处的键字段的值对象。Use the property to retrieve the value of the key field at index 0 in the object. 此属性通常作为快捷方式用于检索一条记录的键值时的主键包含只有一个字段。This property is often used as a shortcut to retrieve the key value of a record when the primary key contains only one field. - 使用属性以创建可用于循环访问键字段值的对象。Use the property to create an object that can be used to iterate through the key field values. 一般情况下，对象自动生成的数据绑定控件时控件的`DataKeyNames`属性设置。In general, objects are automatically generated by data-bound controls when the control's `DataKeyNames` property is set. 对象包含键字段或字段中指定的值`DataKeyNames`属性。The objects contain the values of the key field or fields specified in the `DataKeyNames` property. 每次显示一条记录的数据绑定控件 (如或) 通常存储对象中显示的当前记录`DataKey`控件的属性。Data-bound controls that display a single record at a time (such as or ) generally store the object for the current record displayed in the `DataKey` property of the control. 每次显示多个记录的数据绑定控件 (如) 通常存储对象中的控件中每个记录集合。Data-bound controls that display multiple records at a time (such as ) generally store the objects for each record in the control in a collection. 集合然后存储在`DataKeys`控件的属性。The collection is then stored in the `DataKeys` property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定中的记录的主键值控件并使用属性的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to determine the primary key value of a record in a control using the property of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyValue/CS/DataKeyValuecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyValue/VB/DataKeyValuevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

summary.span: 使用指定的键字段值字典初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类使用指定的键字段值字典。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values. 中包含的字段值传入对象`keyTable`参数用于填充对象。The field values contained in the object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the object. > [!NOTE] > 此版本的构造函数不允许您指定的预先为字段名称列表对象。This version of the constructor does not allow you to specify a list of field names in advance for the object. 由于未预先指定的字段名称，字段名称和值存储在视图状态。Because the field names are not specified in advance, both the field names and values are stored in view state. 若要预先指定的字段名称列表，请使用构造函数。To specify a list of field names in advance, use the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary keyTable, string[] keyNames) cil managed
Public Sub New (keyTable As IOrderedDictionary, keyNames As String())

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The key field values.

param.name: keyNames
param.span: 包含键字段名称的字符串数组。

span.span: An array of strings that contain the names of the key fields.

summary.span: 使用指定的键字段值字典和字段名数组初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类使用指定的键字段值字典和数组的字段名称。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names. 中包含的字段值传入对象`keyTable`参数用于填充对象。The field values contained in the object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the object. 此构造函数还允许您指定的键字段名称的列表对象提前到`keyNames`参数。This constructor also allows you to specify a list of the key field names for the object in advance through the `keyNames` parameter. 预先指定的字段名称，因为只有键字段的值为视图状态中存储时使用此构造函数。Because the field names are specified in advance, only the key field values are stored in view state when this constructor is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于确定是否对象正在跟踪其视图状态更改。The property is used to determine whether the object is tracking its view-state changes. > [!NOTE] > 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

span.para: 扩展时类，您可以重写此属性以指示是否跟踪视图状态更改。
When extending the class, you can override this property to indicate whether view-state changes are tracked.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的对象。The method is used to load the previously saved view state of the object.

exception.span: 不是 ，无法解析为有效的 。

span.span: is not and cannot be resolved to a valid .

span.para: 扩展时类，您可以重写此方法以实现您自己的例程来加载该对象的视图状态。
When extending the class, you can override this method to implement your own routine to load the view state for the object.
